name: MERCY AND CARE FOR COWS DAKSHIN VRINDAVAN PUBLIC CHARITABLE TRUST

address: 80 G Mercy And Care for Cows Dakshin Vrindavan Trust.PDF

briefDescription: Rescuing the Indian cows from slaughter housesOur Volunteers are extending their services to save cows from Slaughter houses and from cruel transporters. We are also endeavoring to preserve Indian cows from extinction.Providing nutritious food, medical care and love to cows.Its not humans to decide the lifespan of animals. We make arrangements so that our saved cows enjoy a good life untill their natural death. We also provide cows perfect medical care and nutritious food. Most important factor at Dakshin Vrindavan are love and dedication from our volunteers and well wishers.
